content: bring some handmade festive magic to your home with the twinkling trees baskets a beautifully bold overlay mosaic crochet design worked in one easy seamless piece from base to rim whether you re searching for a crochet basket pattern a christmas gift a practical holiday crochet basket or a stylish storage tote these charming makes will add warmth and personality to every corner of your home this listing includes three nesting basket sizes detailed written instructions full mosaic charts plus a supporting video tutorial showing you how to crochet a christmas basket using the overlay mosaic technique perfect for plants treats gifting organising or simply adding a cosy touch to your festive décor these baskets are wonderfully versatile and such a joy to make a great project for adventurous beginners and intermediate makers featuring us single_crochet and mosaic double_crochet stitches *please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english not a finished product pattern features 3 nesting sizes included small medium & large baskets technique overlay mosaic crochet construction worked bottom-up in one easy seamless piece handles optional built-in handles skill level intermediate adventurous beginners welcome stitches single_crochet + mosaic double_crochet format instant pdf download + supporting video tutorial language english us terms with uk stitch conversion chart finished sizes approx small basket 3 5 diameter 5 high medium basket 6 5 diameter 6 25 high large basket 9 diameter 8 high designed using worsted weight yarn held double or a single strand of chunky creates a sturdy structured set of nesting baskets perfect for home décor and gifting materials needed category 4 worsted weight yarn held double or category 5 chunky yarn i used 100% acrylic 165m /180yds/100g held double exact yarn detailed in pattern yarn a each size needs approx 100 220 390 yds 1 2 3 balls yarn b each size needs approx 50 110 190 yds 1 1 2 balls crochet hook 5mm h or the size that meets the gauge for the pattern yarn needle scissors stitch markers pattern includes detailed instructions over 14 page ebook stitch guide sizing chart/schematic step by step stitch tutorial colour inspiration page supporting video tutorial customisation guide instant download start crocheting your own christmas crochet basket pattern today purchase includes immediate access to the 14-page pdf pattern in us crochet terms gauge not essential but 4 rounds of base = 3 5 ❤️ make it yours these baskets are more than décor they re heirloom pieces that bring warmth colour and personality to your festive season whether you want holiday crochet baskets handmade organisation thoughtful gifting or a modern take on traditional nesting baskets the twinkling trees design adds charm wherever it goes need help we re here for you contact us anytime in the hanjan crochet community group 1 for pattern support or questions note this listing is for a digital download pdf pattern not the finished item due to the nature of digital downloads no refunds will be issued © 2025 hanjan crochet ltd
